title: Data Scientist
tagsAndSkills: SAS,Artificial Intelligence,Aiml,ETL,Machine Learning,Data Mining,Data Processing,Data Analytics

placeholders.label: Mumbai Suburbs, Navi Mumbai, Mumbai (All Areas)

jobDescription:
The artificial intelligence (AI) landscape is being reshaped by the rise of generative models capable of synthesizing high/low-quality datasuch as text, images, music, videos, and code—from natural language coupled with large data sets.

We are looking for highly motivated candidates for our AI team of data analysts and business analysts. In this role you will be responsible for creating solutions in ML, artificial intelligence (AI), and data science. You will work closely with the TCG living space business ecosystem to define the AI strategy of India’s first real estate ecosystem of developers, brokers, societies, sellers and end customers who are residents.

The ideal candidate will be intricately involved in running AI/ML based analytical experiments in a methodical manner, and will regularly evaluate alternate models via theoretical approaches. This is the perfect opportunity for the successful candidate to become a part of an innovative and energetic team that develops analysis tools which will influence both our products and clients. You’ll be expected to execute in the face of ambiguity, shifting priorities, and limited resources.

The primary focus should be to capture customer data in a way so that we can create deep personal insights(DPI) leading to a personalised experience for all the stakeholders using the application. Along with DPI, Conversational AI discovery is another important aspect which the candidate has to work through creating a personalised immersive experience which is one of a kind in the real estate industry leading to market leading customer experience. An emerging area of research which the candidate might be involved within the AI ecosystem is one which aims to provide access to digitally stored information through a conversational user interface. The goal of such systems is to effectively process a wide range of queries in natural language, with extensive dialog between the user and the system being a critical component to understanding the user’s intent and refining responses.

About the Responsibilities

  • Research and develop statistical learning models for data analysis around deep personal insights and personalisation.
  • Collaborate with product management and engineering departments to understand company needs and devise possible solutions.
  • Keep up-to-date with latest technology trends.
  • Communicate results and ideas to key decision makers.
  • Implement new statistical or other mathematical methodologies as needed for specific models or analysis.
  • Ideas & insights into newer AI-powered business models.
  • Projects/products implementation methodologies/processes (agile etc.).
  • AI algorithms around search, research & related roadmap.
  • Develop Conversational AI models and Search and discovery.
  • Technologies & related roadmap.
  • AI platform/products architecture/design/implementation vis-a-vis cloud AI services.
  • AI governance (ethical AI) and related processes.
  • AI/ML models continuous delivery/deployment strategies.
  • Communication with customers/partners /internal stakeholders.

Relevant Qualifications

  • Bachelors/Master’s Degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Applied Math or related field from one of the premier institutes in India/Abroad. IIT/IIIT/ISI/RECs would be preferred.
  • 5+ years’ practical experience with AI/ML, SAS, ETL, data processing, database programming and data analytics.
  • Extensive background in data mining and statistical analysis.
  • Able to understand various data structures and common methods in data transformation.
  • Excellent pattern recognition and predictive modelling skills.
  • Conversational AI skills is a plus.
  • Experience with programming languages such as Java/Python an asset.

title: Technical Sales Engineer
tagsAndSkills: Equipment Sales,Technical Unit Operations,Chemical Engineering,Chemical,Pharmaceutical,Equipment,Sales,Technical
jobDescription:
Job Summary:


We are seeking a dynamic and technically proficient Technical Sales Engineer with a background in Chemical Engineering to join our team. The ideal candidate will have 3 to 4 years of experience in the field, strong knowledge of chemical unit operations, and the ability to effectively communicate technical information to customers in the pharmaceutical and chemical industries. This role requires a blend of technical expertise and sales acumen to drive the growth of our process equipment product lines.


Key Responsibilities:


Technical Sales & Support:


  • Engage with potential and existing clients to understand their technical requirements.
  • Provide technical guidance and recommend suitable process equipment solutions based on customer needs.
  • Prepare and deliver technical presentations to customers, demonstrating the value and benefits of our products.

Customer Relationship Management:


  • Develop and maintain strong relationships with customers in the pharmaceutical and chemical sectors.
  • Act as the primary point of contact for customers, addressing their inquiries and resolving technical issues.

Sales Strategy & Execution:


  • Collaborate with the sales team to develop and execute sales strategies aimed at achieving sales targets.
  • Identify and pursue new business opportunities within the target industries.
  • Negotiate contracts and close sales deals, ensuring customer satisfaction and long-term relationships.

Qualifications:


  • Bachelors degree in chemical engineering or a related field.
  • 3 - 4 years of experience in technical sales or a similar role within the chemical or pharmaceutical industry.
  • Strong knowledge of chemical unit operations and process equipment.
  • Proven ability to understand complex technical concepts and convey them to non-technical audiences.
  • Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with a strong focus on achieving sales targets.
  • Proficiency in using CRM / ERP software and Microsoft Office.

Preferred Skills:


  • Experience with process equipment used in the pharmaceutical and chemical industries.
  • Familiarity with industry standards and regulations.
  • Additional certifications in sales or technical fields are a plus.

title: Associate - Quality
tagsAndSkills: Line Inspection,Handling various gauges,PDI,Supplier Audit,Quality Tools,ISO 9001 - 2015,Quality Documentation,Line
jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities

Able to handle manufacturing line raw material receipt to PDI line all quality activity handling.


Able to Perform Receiving inspection and Quality documentation for tube/cover tube.


Analysis of Customer return and Warranty fail material along with internal team and respective supplier.


Resolving customer complaint by Quality Tools, 8D, 7QC,CAPA.


Conducting Internal audit, In process Audit, Supplier Audit.


ISO 9001:2015 documentation & internal audit planning


Performing SPC & MSA study, Process & Product audit.


Performing analysis of Online & End line Rejection & taking CAPA to reduce rejection.


Preparation of monthly Rework/Rejection charts in terms of PPM & Pareto Analysis


Send Supplier rejection details & take necessary action along with respective suppliers.


Inspection of various Machined components (In house & Outdoor). Inspection report prepare at each & every stage of Manufacturing.


Prepare plan calibration of instruments with third party calibration lab


Preferred candidate profile

1) Able to perform Line inspection and Quality documentation

2) Reducing inline rejection DPPM with effective actions

3) Resolving customer complaints & in-house complaints.

4) ISO 9001:-2015 awareness and documentation.

5) Inform supplier about the NC observed online with in 24hrs and work for action.

6) Supplier audit and ISO audits

7) Manufacturing Line inspection experience 2 to 3 years,

8) Prepare receipt parts Tube/cover inspection reports

9) Qualification ITI/diploma Mechanical engineering

10) Able to handle all instruments inside caliper, micrometer, Vernier, air gauge , snap gauge etc.


Perks and benefits
